snippet.title: Tilt! / Hyper 3-D Pinball  - Video Game Trailer (Euro). PC MS-DOS. (1995)
snippet.description:
Tilt! : official video game trailer, European version.
Developed by NMS Software Ltd.
Published by Virgin Interactive Entertainment in 1995 for PC (MS-DOS), in 1996 for Sega Saturn and in 1997 for Sony Playstation.
Year : 1995
System : PC (MS-DOS), Saturn (1996), Playstation (1997).

In North America the game title was changed to 'hyper 3-D Pinball'

Video Found in the 'Virgin Interactive Hypergames' CD (1995 product line).
